title: Live news: The week ahead

description: Tighter monetary policy could have benefits for younger people, says think-tank

title: Tory pledge to build 40 new hospitals will fail, says report
description: Spending watchdog warns of multiple problems with construction programme

title: NHS consultants in England step up their plans for strikes
description: Rail workers will also walk out this week in dispute over pay and working conditions

title: Sunak to crack down on ‘poor quality’ university courses
description: Education regulator will be required to limit number of students doing certain subjects

title: Iran to resume hijab patrols after protests over death in custody
description: Islamic republic threatens renewed enforcement by morality police 10 months after Mahsa Amini lost her life

title: Fundraising triggers fresh questions over DeSantis campaign
description: Small donations indicate dwindling grassroots support for Florida governor’s Republican bid

title: Tunisia agrees deal with EU to tackle Mediterranean migration routes
description: Brussels to provide €100mn to strengthen border controls as numbers crossing to Italy by boat double in a year

title: Křetínský set to win battle for Casino after rivals drop out
description: Revised offer would lead to €1.2bn equity injection in debt-laden French supermarket

title: Moscow seizes Russian subsidiaries of Danone and Carlsberg’s Baltika
description: First such move against western businesses since takeovers of Finland’s Fortum and Germany’s Uniper in April

title: China to update on economy and Spain goes to the polls
description: Plus, Conservatives face defeat in trio of UK by-elections

description: In the 19th century, the public initially turned a blind eye to prison hulks — but not so today

description: Labour leader dashes hopes his party would scrap restriction introduced by the government

description: ‘Je t’aime… moi non plus’ singer was known for her partnership with Serge Gainsbourg

description: Measure prompts concerns over higher inflation after increases in value added tax

description: Brussels’ economy chief says bloc must pump billions of euros into critical industries to compete globally

description: Market Questions is the FT’s guide to the week ahead

description: The bloc needs more and closer allies on issues like supply chains, tech rules and climate change

description: Deepening deficits now make the US one of the most fiscally irresponsible nations

description: People warned to stay indoors in middle of day as fears mount for public health

description: Inmates close to release have often not received the support and training needed to prepare for work

description: Chinese government halted negotiations in protest at Nancy Pelosi’s Taiwan trip last year

description: Retailer’s redevelopment bid has raised questions about the environmental costs of demolishing and replacing older buildings as opposed to retrofitting them

title: Multinationals in China accelerate push to decouple data
description: Beijing’s move to expand anti-espionage rules and data regulation has companies racing to hive off systems
